movies.title: The Legend of Ben Hall
movies.plot: Ben Hall is drawn back into bushranging by the reappearance of his old friend John Gilbert. Reforming the gang, they soon become the most wanted men in Australian history.

studios.title: Legend of Ben Hall Movie, The

events.title: Ben Hall is betrayed and shot to death by police

movies.title: Danger Close
movies.plot: Vietnam War, 1966. Australia and New Zealand send troops to support the United States and South Vietnamese in their fight against the communist North. Soldiers are very young men, recruits and volunteers who have never been involved in a combat. On August 18th, members of Delta Company will face the true horror of a ruthless battle among the trees of a rubber plantation called Long TÃ¢n. They are barely a hundred. The enemy is a human wave ready to destroy them.
